overview: Juga (Play), fresh ideas of goodness that appear on the young minds of children that molds their perspective on friendship and team building, just like the ASEAN wat of caring, preparing, and prosperity. It will also give a testifying belief that you don't have to be powerful, famous, rich, old or anybody for you to help others. Whether you are a child or a simple person, you will be able to help others if you want to help.
title: Juga
